action.action-desc: Mr. Graves of Missouri introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permanently extend the Medicare-dependent hospital and low-volume hospital programs under the Medicare program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Hospital Extensions for Low-volume Programs Act of 2022 or the Rural HELP Act of 2022.

section.header: Permanently extending the Medicare-dependent hospital and low-volume hospital programs under the Medicare program

subsection.header: Extension of the Medicare-Dependent hospital (MDH) program

subparagraph.text: Section 13501(e)(2) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note) is amended by striking fiscal year 2000 through fiscal year 2022 and inserting a subsequent fiscal year.
